thread.title: Small Business Administration seeks award nominees
thread.title_full: Small Business Administration seeks award nominees - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Small Business Administration seeks award nominees
text:
MONTPELIER, Vt. (AP) - The Vermont district office of the Small Business Administration is looking for nominations for its 2016 awards.
Past winners include Ben & Jerry's and Switchback Brewing Company. Last year's 2015 Small Business Person of the Year was Monica Greene, president of Vermont Precision Tools.
Other categories are exporter of the year, family-owned business of the year, minority-owned small business of the year and young entrepreneur of the year.
Businesses may nominate themselves. The deadline for submissions is Jan. 11 by 3 p.m. and must include the name of the business and owner, address, phone number, email address and category of award.
Nominee suggestions can be emailed to vermont - do@sba.gov
